name: Fried Cabbage & Onions
ingredients: 1 pound cabbage, coarsely chopped (about 1 small head)

instructions.ja: ベーコン、キャベツ、玉ねぎを刻む

instructions.en: In a large skillet, fry the chopped bacon until almost crisp
instructions.sk: Na veľkej panvici opečte nakrájanú slaninu, kým nebude takmer chrumkavá
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンで刻んだベーコンをほぼカリカリになるまで揚げる

instructions.en: Add chopped cabbage and onions to the skillet; cook and stir until cabbage is wilted and lightly browned
instructions.sk: Pridajte nakrájanú kapustu a cibuľu do panvice; varte a miešajte, kým kapusta nezvädne a mierne nezhnedne
instructions.ja: 刻んだキャベツと玉ねぎをフライパンに加え、キャベツがしんなりして軽く焦げ目がつくまで炒める

instructions.en: Season with salt and pepper to taste
instructions.sk: Ochuťte soľou a korením podľa chuti
instructions.ja: 塩コショウで味を調える
